system.type:
Characteristics are the core statistics of a character, and determine how well they perform certain tasks. In Only War, Characteristic Upgrades require XP based on the number of Upgrades and Shared Aptitudes.
Zero Apts/Opposed: 500/750/1,000/2,500 xp. One Apt/Allied: 250/500/750/1,000 xp. Two Apts/True Align: 100/250/500/750 xp
